utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: Why hast thou forsaken me, O deity whose existence I doubt?

utterance.speaker: Policeman
utterance.content: Here. Breathe into this bag.

utterance.speaker: Leonard
utterance.content: What’s going on?

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: They stole everything, Leonard, everything.

utterance.speaker: Policeman
utterance.content: Are you the roommate?

utterance.speaker: Leonard
utterance.content: Yeah, Leonard Hofstadter. What happened?

utterance.speaker: Policeman
utterance.content: Your friend here called 911 to report a robbery.

utterance.speaker: Leonard
utterance.content: Oh, my God, what did they get?

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: What didn’t they get? They got my enchanted weapons, my vicious gladiator armour, my wand of untainted power, and all my gold.

utterance.speaker: Leonard
utterance.content: You called the police because someone hacked your World of Warcraft account?

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: What choice did I have? The mighty Sheldor, level 85 blood elf, hero of the Eastern kingdoms, has been picked clean, like a carcass in the desert sun. Plus, the FBI hung up on me.

utterance.speaker: Policeman
utterance.content: Into the bag.

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: They took my battle ostrich.

utterance.speaker: Leonard
utterance.content: Oh, no, not Glenn?

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: Yes, Glenn! The only bird I ever loved.

utterance.speaker: Policeman
utterance.content: Good luck, fellas.

utterance.speaker: Leonard
utterance.content: Thank you, officer.

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: Wait a minute! You’re not going to do anything?

utterance.speaker: Policeman
utterance.content: Mr. Cooper, there’s nothing…

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: Doctor Cooper.

utterance.speaker: Policeman
utterance.content: Seriously?

utterance.speaker: Leonard
utterance.content: Not the kind with access to drugs.

utterance.speaker: Policeman
utterance.content: Fine. Dr. Cooper. I’m sorry for your loss, but the Pasadena Police Department doesn’t have jurisdiction in Pandora.

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: That’s from Avatar, World of Warcraft takes place in Azeroth. Goodness gracious, how are you allowed to carry a gun? Can you at least refer me to a rogue ex-cop?

utterance.speaker: Policeman
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: You know, one who was drummed off the force because he refused to play by the rules, and now he hires himself out to impose his own brand of rough justice?

utterance.speaker: Policeman
utterance.content: No.

utterance.speaker: Leonard
utterance.content: Thank you, officer.

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: It’s all gone. All gone.

utterance.speaker: Leonard
utterance.content: I’m really sorry, Sheldon.

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: What kind of world do we live in, where a man would take another man’s battle ostrich?

utterance.speaker: Leonard
utterance.content: I don’t know.

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: This act of aggression must be met with swift and cruel ferocity. It is time to cry havoc, and let slip the dogs of war.

utterance.speaker: Leonard
utterance.content: I’m on it. Hi, Mrs. Wolowitz. Is, is Howard there? Okay, thanks. That particular dog of war will have to call you back after his bath.

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: See if Raj is done with Pilates.

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: Three thousand hours. Three thousand hours clicking on that mouse, collecting weapons and gold. It’s almost as if it was a huge waste of time.

utterance.speaker: Howard
utterance.content: Whoever did this knew what they were doing. He got in and out of your account in under 15 minutes, transferred all your stuff, and didn’t leave a digital fingerprint.

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: Oh! There isn’t enough camomile tea in the world to quell the rage in my heart.

utterance.speaker: Raj
utterance.content: Hold on. I’m talking to an orc under the bridge in Thunder Bluff who says if we pay him, he’ll help us track down your things.

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: Can we trust him?

utterance.speaker: Raj
utterance.content: I should say so, he appears to be a member of the Nigerian royal family.

utterance.speaker: Howard
utterance.content: Whoa! Somebody’s auctioning off a jewelled ostrich bridle!

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: No. Glenn’s was leather. He was a simple ostrich. Is! Is, I haven’t given up hope.

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: Hey.

utterance.speaker: Leonard
utterance.content: Hey, Penny. We’re kind of in the middle of a crisis, here.

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: Oh, I know. Bernadette told me. Sorry, Sheldon. I know that game meant a lot to you.

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: That game? Excuse me, Penny, but Doodle Jump is a game. Angry Birds is a game. World of Warcraft is a massively multi-player online role-playing… all right, technically it’s a game.

utterance.speaker: Raj
utterance.content: Bad news, the Nigerian prince may be a fraud.

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: Okay, well, anyways, I brought you a day-old cheesecake to cheer you up!

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: Stale pastry is hollow succour to a man who is bereft of ostrich.

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: Just say thank you.

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: I thought I just did.

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: All right. See you later.

utterance.speaker: Priya
utterance.content: Oh! Hello.

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: Oh, hi! I was just dropping off a cheesecake to Sheldon. He was robbed of a bunch of imaginary crap that’s useful in a make-believe place.

utterance.speaker: Priya
utterance.content: I don’t know what that means.

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: Yeah, well, sadly, I do.

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: Did you know last weekend Priya took Leonard rollerblading at the beach? Can you believe that?

utterance.speaker: Bernadette
utterance.content: I feel like I’m supposed to say that bitch, but I don’t have enough information.

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: I am the one who spent two years trying to get him to even go to the beach in the first place. And he was so phobic about stepping on medical waste, I had to carry him to the water.

utterance.speaker: Bernadette
utterance.content: I took Howard to the beach once. He almost burst into flames like a vampire.

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: So what’s the thanks I get for turning Leonard into quality boyfriend material? I have to tiptoe around his new girlfriend.

utterance.speaker: Amy
utterance.content: I think you’re on.

utterance.speaker: Bernadette
utterance.content: Oh. That bitch!

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: Want some coffee liqueur on your ice cream?

utterance.speaker: Amy
utterance.content: Ah, here’s the alcohol and drug peer pressure Mother warned me about. I was starting to think it was never going to happen. Yes, please.

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: You guys should’ve seen Leonard when I first met him. There was no eye contact. He was either looking up at the ceiling, or down at his shoes.

utterance.speaker: Amy
utterance.content: I’m drunk.

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: You know, for the first couple of months, whenever I would take off my bra, he would giggle and say, oh boy, my breast friends.

utterance.speaker: Bernadette
utterance.content: Well, if it makes you feel any better, I’m never speaking to Priya again.

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: No, don’t do that. No reason to be mean to her.

utterance.speaker: Amy
utterance.content: This may be the alcohol talking, but I believe there is. Are you familiar with the recent study of Tanzanian chimpanzees by Nishida and Hosaka out of Kyoto University?

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: No, but I can name all the Kardashians.

utterance.speaker: Amy
utterance.content: Primates, such as ourselves, have a natural instinct to ostracize ill-mannered members of the troop. Bernadette’s urge to shun, scowl or fling her waste at Priya is hard-wired into her DNA.

utterance.speaker: Bernadette
utterance.content: I don’t have an urge to fling my waste.

utterance.speaker: Amy
utterance.content: Believe me, it’s there, we all have it. Hit me with some more booze, and I’ll show you.

utterance.speaker: Howard
utterance.content: All right, here we are, this is the tavern where all the black-market weapon trades go down.

utterance.speaker: Raj
utterance.content: I don’t think my character should be in a place like this. Everyone’s undressing her with their eyes.

utterance.speaker: Howard
utterance.content: Maybe if you stop dropping your sword and bending over to pick it up.

utterance.speaker: Leonard
utterance.content: Okay, what exactly are we looking for?

utterance.speaker: Howard
utterance.content: Redheaded troll, goes by the name of Glumly. According to the message boards, if you want to move stolen goods and it’s after school hours, he’s your guy.

utterance.speaker: Priya
utterance.content: Leonard, is this going to take much longer? I thought we were going to spend some time together.

utterance.speaker: Leonard
utterance.content: Uh, we are. In the meantime, you’re welcome to whip up a quick character and join us.

utterance.speaker: Priya
utterance.content: Seriously?

utterance.speaker: Leonard
utterance.content: Well, you have to put in a credit card number, but it’s fun.

utterance.speaker: Priya
utterance.content: Maybe I should just go home.

utterance.speaker: Howard
utterance.content: Our troll just walked in! I got him!

utterance.speaker: Leonard
utterance.content: We got him. We’re almost done.

utterance.speaker: Howard
utterance.content: So, how do you guys want to play this?

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: Be ruthless. You tell him if he doesn’t start talking, we’ll register a complaint with his Internet service provider.

utterance.speaker: Raj
utterance.content: Sheldon, what if he gets his Internet from his cable company? He could lose his HBO and all their delightful original programming.

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: I don’t care! I’m losin’ it, man!

utterance.speaker: Leonard
utterance.content: Why don’t we play this smart? Try a little good goblin, bad goblin.

utterance.speaker: Priya
utterance.content: Oh, dear Lord.

utterance.speaker: Howard
utterance.content: Nah, I think we have to be more subtle.

utterance.speaker: Raj
utterance.content: Okay, I see where this is going. Fine, I’ll have sex with him.

utterance.speaker: Leonard
utterance.content: That’s not where it was going.

utterance.speaker: Raj
utterance.content: Good, because I would hate that.

utterance.speaker: Priya
utterance.content: Leonard, you’re busy, let’s talk tomorrow.

utterance.speaker: Leonard
utterance.content: Oh, wait. Hang on. Are you upset?

utterance.speaker: Priya
utterance.content: No, no, I think it’s sexy to date a boy trapped in a man’s body.

utterance.speaker: Leonard
utterance.content: Good, good. I’ll tell you what happens.

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: And people think I don’t get sarcasm.

utterance.speaker: Amy
utterance.content: Well, well, well. Look who it is.

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: Okay, be nice.

utterance.speaker: Priya
utterance.content: Hello.

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: Hi. We’re just heading out for a drink.

utterance.speaker: Amy
utterance.content: Because I do that now.

utterance.speaker: Bernadette
utterance.content: Count your blessings you’re not a Tanzanian chimp.

utterance.speaker: Priya
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: Don’t listen to her, she’s had a lot of ice cream. Do you want to join us?

utterance.speaker: Priya
utterance.content: Oh, thank you, but I have work to do.

utterance.speaker: Amy
utterance.content: Four women walk down the stairs, how many reach the lobby?

utterance.speaker: Leonard
utterance.content: Did your sister say anything when you got home last night?

utterance.speaker: Raj
utterance.content: Oh, no, don’t put me in the middle of this. I’m not going to be your go-between.

utterance.speaker: Leonard
utterance.content: Come on, help me out. Am I in trouble?

utterance.speaker: Raj
utterance.content: There’s no reason to worry.

utterance.speaker: Leonard
utterance.content: That’s a relief.

utterance.speaker: Raj
utterance.content: I’m sure many women in happy relationships spend their nights skyping with their ex-boyfriend Sanjay.

utterance.speaker: Howard
utterance.content: Good news, gentlemen, I found our hacker.

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Leonard
utterance.content: Really?

utterance.speaker: Howard
utterance.content: Yeah. No one can hide from me, not Waldo, not Carmen San Diego, not even topless Natalie Portman.

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: I’ve never said these words before, but good job, Howard!

utterance.speaker: Howard
utterance.content: Thanks. Our culprit is one Mr. Todd Zarnecki, 2711 Ocean View Road, Carlsbad, California.

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: The name and the address drip with evil.

utterance.speaker: Raj
utterance.content: What else do we know about him?

utterance.speaker: Howard
utterance.content: Well, quite a bit, actually.

utterance.speaker: Leonard
utterance.content: I’ll bet he’s some loser who lives with his parents.

utterance.speaker: Howard
utterance.content: Yes, he does live with his parents. Here’s a Google Earth shot of their house.

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: Excellent! It’s in a cul-de-sac. We can box him in.

utterance.speaker: Leonard
utterance.content: Hold on, you’re thinking of going there?

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: Carlsbad is only a couple of hours away.

utterance.speaker: Leonard
utterance.content: Fine. You walk up to the house, knock on the door and demand your stuff back. What if he says no?

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: I don’t know if you’ve been following the news, Leonard, but there have been some terrific advancements in the field of torture.

utterance.speaker: Leonard
utterance.content: No one’s getting tortured.

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: Fine, we’ll abide by the Geneva Convention. But ask yourself this, in the course of our lives, how much lunch money has been taken from us? How many kites? How many Scooby-Doo Trapper Keepers?

utterance.speaker: Raj
utterance.content: I totally had one of those.

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: Of course you did. It was a fun and practical way of organizing your school work. But the bullies took it from us. Well, no more. Tonight, we take back our dignity, our birthright and our pride. What do you say? Who’s with me?

utterance.speaker: Raj
utterance.content: I have a hip-hop aerobics class at five, could we go after?

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: Sure.

utterance.speaker: Howard
utterance.content: Also, tonight’s the Sabbath and my mother and I have a tradition of lighting the candles and

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: Fine. Leonard?

utterance.speaker: Leonard
utterance.content: Oh, geez, I don’t know if I can ditch Priya two nights in a row.

utterance.speaker: Raj
utterance.content: Oh, come on, man. Bros before… my sister.

utterance.speaker: Leonard
utterance.content: Aw, screw it. I’m in.

utterance.speaker: Raj
utterance.content: Me, too.

utterance.speaker: Howard
utterance.content: And me.

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: One moment. I’m hell-bent on catching a cyber criminal, not the common cold.

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: I’m sorry, I thought this delay was so you could watch Wheel of Fortune with your mother.

utterance.speaker: Howard
utterance.content: I am. She’s just bleaching her moustache. Check it out. Hey, Ma! Before and After! Four words, 17 letters, two N’s, one V.

utterance.speaker: Howard’s Mother (off)
utterance.content: Fanny pack of wolves.

utterance.speaker: Leonard
utterance.content: That’s incredible.

utterance.speaker: Howard
utterance.content: Yeah, she’s kind of a Wheel savant.

utterance.speaker: Leonard (phone rings)
utterance.content: Uh-oh, that’s Priya.

utterance.speaker: Raj
utterance.content: Sitar music for her ringtone is not cool, dude.

utterance.speaker: Leonard
utterance.content: Hit the… Hey, sweetie. Yeah, I’m sorry. I’m gonna be working late. I, I, I miss you, too. Okay, sure, I’ll call you when I get home. Okay, bye-bye.

utterance.speaker: Raj
utterance.content: Very nice. You lie to my sister.

utterance.speaker: Howard
utterance.content: That’s the nicest thing he does to your sister.

utterance.speaker: Raj (phone rings)
utterance.content: Oh, guess who.

utterance.speaker: Leonard
utterance.content: Cover for me.

utterance.speaker: Raj
utterance.content: Hello, Priya. What’s up? How would I know if Leonard’s at work or not? Don’t be suspicious. Look, if you want your relationship with Leonard to continue, you’re going to have to believe whatever wild-eyed, cockamamie excuse the white devil has the nerve to offer you. Okay? Yeah, bye-bye. You owe me.

utterance.speaker: Howard
utterance.content: New puzzle, Ma. Same name. One N, two D’s, three O’s.

utterance.speaker: Howard’s Mother (off)
utterance.content: Whoopi and Rube Goldberg!

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: That’s uncanny.

utterance.speaker: Howard
utterance.content: I know. It’s her superpower. Well, that and jiggling her arm fat.

utterance.speaker: Leonard
utterance.content: I can’t believe we’re going all the way to San Diego to confront this guy.

utterance.speaker: Howard
utterance.content: Yeah, we’re kind of bad-asses, aren’t we?

utterance.speaker: Leonard
utterance.content: Totally.

utterance.speaker: Raj
utterance.content: Hey, how about we stay the night and hit Legoland in the morning?

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: Sea World is better. It has Shamu, who is literally tons of fun. But for the moment, let’s stay focused on Todd Zarnecki.

utterance.speaker: Raj
utterance.content: Yeah, we’re coming for you, Todd Zarnecki. And for the record, Legoland is more interactive.

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: I almost feel sorry for the poor fool, sitting in his split-level suburban ranch, unaware that a vengeful horde is barrelling down the San Diego Freeway at 71 miles an hour. Ease up there, lead foot. You trying to get us killed?

utterance.speaker: Raj
utterance.content: I took the liberty of burning us a mix of heroic questing music.

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: This says Beyonce Bootylicious Dance Mix.

utterance.speaker: Raj
utterance.content: It’s a re-writable CD. Just put it in.

utterance.speaker: Howard
utterance.content: Beyonce? Really?

utterance.speaker: Raj
utterance.content: She’s curvy and she owns it. I like that.

utterance.speaker: Leonard (as Ride of the Valkyries begins)
utterance.content: Oh, yeah, I’m feeling it.

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: We are winged fury! Which is still no excuse for going over the posted speed limit.

utterance.speaker: Howard
utterance.content: Next time we go to kick someone’s ass, we take the train.

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: I always prefer the train.

utterance.speaker: Leonard
utterance.content: Sheldon, let’s go.

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: Coming.

utterance.speaker: Howard
utterance.content: Why did you bring that?

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: No weapon strikes more fear into a man’s heart than a Klingon bat’leth.

utterance.speaker: Leonard
utterance.content: Okay, let’s get clear on something. We’re just going to tell this guy to transfer all of your stuff back into your account and then be on our way. No one’s bat’lething anybody.

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: So my blade shall not taste blood tonight?

utterance.speaker: Leonard
utterance.content: No.

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: Well, now I just feel silly holding it.

utterance.speaker: Leonard
utterance.content: Come on.

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: Can I at least kick down the door?

utterance.speaker: Leonard
utterance.content: You’re welcome to try, but the other day, it took you 15 minutes to get into a FedEx box.

utterance.speaker: Voice Inside
utterance.content: Who is it?

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: Your doom!

utterance.speaker: Raj
utterance.content: Don’t say your doom. Who opens the door for their doom?

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: Good point. Basket of puppies.

utterance.speaker: Huge man (opening door)
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Leonard
utterance.content: Uh, Sheldon?

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: Are you Todd Zarnecki?

utterance.speaker: Todd
utterance.content: Yeah. Who are you?

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: I am Sheldor of Azeroth. I want my things back.

utterance.speaker: Todd
utterance.content: I don’t think so. Let me see that.

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: Careful. That’s a collectible.

utterance.speaker: Todd
utterance.content: I know. I’ve always wanted one.

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: Well, he’s even more cunning than we thought.

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: You know, the joke’s on him. Without the certificate of authenticity, that bat’leth is worthless.

utterance.speaker: Howard
utterance.content: Yeah, he walked right into our trap.

utterance.speaker: Raj
utterance.content: Legoland seems like a hollow dream now.

utterance.speaker: Leonard
utterance.content: Oh-oh.

utterance.speaker: Raj
utterance.content: What’s the matter?

utterance.speaker: Leonard
utterance.content: Something’s wrong, I’m not getting any gas. Anybody know anything about internal combustion engines?

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: Of course.

utterance.speaker: Raj
utterance.content: Very basic.

utterance.speaker: Howard
utterance.content: 19th-century technology.

utterance.speaker: Leonard
utterance.content: Does anybody know how to fix an internal combustion engine?

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: No.

utterance.speaker: Howard
utterance.content: No, not a clue.

utterance.speaker: Leonard
utterance.content: Well, we’d better call somebody to come pick us up.

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: It’d be swell if they had a train.

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: Thank you, Penny.

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: No problem. So, Leonard, I think it’s interesting you didn’t call your girlfriend to come get you.

utterance.speaker: Leonard
utterance.content: Uh, I kind of told her I was working.

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: So you lied to her. Also interesting.

utterance.speaker: Leonard
utterance.content: Yeah, she doesn’t really understand the whole Warcraft adventure-role-playing thing.

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: Well, doesn’t matter if she gets it, as long as she’s pretty.

utterance.speaker: Howard
utterance.content: This one’s funny, Leonard. How come you couldn’t make it work with her?

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: So did you at least get Sheldon’s fake stuff back?

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: No. We failed in our noble quest.

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: How come?

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: Todd Zarnecki was mean.

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: All right. Hang on.

utterance.speaker: Leonard
utterance.content: What are you doing?

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: I’m gonna show you how we finish a quest in Nebraska. Oh. Beyonce. This ain’t no Beyonce.

utterance.speaker: Todd
utterance.content: Now what?

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: Give my friend his stuff back.

utterance.speaker: Todd
utterance.content: I don’t know what you’re talking about.

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: Well, then, good news. Today’s the day a girl’s finally going to touch you in your little special place. Now give him his stuff back.

utterance.speaker: Todd
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: We did it! I said, we.

utterance.speaker: Priya
utterance.content: Oh, hold the door.

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: Oh, hi.

utterance.speaker: Priya
utterance.content: Hi.

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: Going to see Leonard?

utterance.speaker: Priya
utterance.content: Yes. How have you been?

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: Fine. You?

utterance.speaker: Priya
utterance.content: Very well, thank you.

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: Alright, well great seeing you.

utterance.speaker: Priya
utterance.content: Yeah, you too.

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: Amy’s right. I do want to fling my poop at her.
